law.catch_line: Each policy of group life insurance shall contain a provision that requires the insurer to issue to ...
law.text:
Each policy of group life insurance shall contain a provision that requires the insurer to issue to the policyholder, for delivery to each insured, an individual certificate that states:
the insurance protection to which the insured is entitled;
each person to whom the insurance benefits are payable; and
the rights and conditions set forth in § 17-102 of this title and §§ 17-309 through 17-311 of this subtitle.
